tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: I had visited this clinic for my crown fitment today. Based on my Father's recommendation and my earlier good experience from Dr. Saubhik Ghosh I revisited him almost after 4.7 years and was surprised to see a big change on Dr. Saubhik 's behavior while talking to me (patient).I had requested for some discount on the total bill value which was quite high for which he told me that he has already done it and I should not tell him again as this irritates him when someone asks and after telling this he left his chair. As a woman I felt very disrespectful and dishonored with this awful behavior. Time has changed him completely *** *** **** ********** ** ** **** ***** *** *** ** **** ***** *** ******** Well there is a way to say No to a patient and its being said that Doctor's behavior creates an impression on patient's mind which helps to cure in an additional way. * ****** *** ******* ***** ** ***** *** ** ****** **** ******** My Father and my Husband (also an old patient Of Dr. Saubhik) is literally surprised with this incident. Neither I nor any of my family member would ever visit him again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Dental Implant Fixing,Dental Cavity Filling,Scaling / Polishing,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review: Dr Saubhik Ghosh is highly experienced.I barely waited to be helped when I checked in. The staff and Dr.Ghosh were all very friendly and helpful. I especially loved how doctor really took his time to explain my condition as well as treatment options. I had a great visit and the doctor’s demeanor has really put me at ease . Amazing staff who always welcome patient with smiling face , they ensured I had a smooth prep, surgery and follow up. I am so glad I choose Medi dent  so I highly recommend this clinic and Dr Saubhik Ghosh.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: The overall experience was very comfortable. Each step was explained properly. There was no haste in any part of the process. The surgery was carried out with a lot of expertise. Thanks to both Dr Souvik Ghosh and Dr Suvadip Kundu.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I'm grateful to Dr. Saubhik Ghosh and his team for making me feel less anxious on the day of my wisdom tooth extraction. He had very patiently explained the entire procedure to me and also the 'Do's and Don'ts '. A skillful dentist like Dr. Ghosh is always a blessing.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
A Doctor is a specialised person in his own field but as a patient when we go  to the doctor we want to feel that he will explain what is the problem what should be the treatment ...Dr Ghosh always does this in addition he feels for the patient and always gives  confidence to the patient nicely explains the budgetory matter ...what will be the cost  effective measures  and result of treatment.
He connects with the patient that most important.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: He is a friendly professional. Did not lose his calm for even a second throughout the treatment. He was giving me explanation prior to each step to help me understand the process. I found this approach really helpful. Also the advice about the crown seemed logical whereas I was kinda misguided by my previous dentist. Overall a very pleasant but professional experience.

tags: None
review:

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: **** ****** *** good person also.helpful and friendly behaviour makes patient happy. But atmosphere of the clinic is not that good.
reply_text:
Dear Mrs Saha, greetings from Medident. Thank you for your generous words. However, we would like to get a detailed insight regarding your opinion of not that great atmosphere inside our clinic. Constructive criticism is what which has always driven us forward and helps in giving a better treatment experience to our patients. But at the same time, there can be some observations which may be misleading to other patients and doctors as well. Hence, it will be great if we can have a detailed conversation regarding your issues with our clinic atmosphere. Stay safe.
Regards
Dr Saubhik Ghosh
